Wedbush Morgan analyst Lou Kerner says, Facebook is the most ominous threat to Google, but Facebook is just emblematic of the rising pace at which all of these( startups) are moving. It's Facebook today, it's Groupon tomorrow, and it will be someone else after that. Google still hasn't been able to develop an effective social networking tool to counter Facebook, a delay that could cost the company dearly as Facebook learns more about people's ages, hometowns and passions.
